user_query: I need a business plan for my startup idea. It should include market analysis, financial projections, and a marketing strategy.

TaskList.description: Conduct market research to analyze target market, competitors, and industry trends.
Generate financial projections including revenue forecasts, expense estimates, and break-even analysis.
Develop a marketing strategy outlining promotional tactics, sales channels, and customer engagement.
Compile all findings and projections into a comprehensive business plan document.
